title: Plagiarism Prevention Research-Based Simulation Education for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Scientific paper writing and foundational knowledge of research ethics
context.additional_context: A program simulating scientific paper writing in VR environments with hands-on plagiarism prevention training.

learning_goals: Learners can apply citation and reference formatting methods from scientific papers with 90% accuracy.
Learners identify over 80% of plagiarism-inducing situations (intentional/unintentional) and establish coping strategies.
Learners can complete the paper-writing process while adhering to research ethics principles in a VR simulation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
